TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChtmlTextWriter extends System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter

summary.span: 向 ASP.NET 服务器控件的输出流写入一系列特定于 cHTML 的字符和文本。

span.span: Writes a series of cHTML-specific characters and text to the output stream of an ASP.NET server control.

summary.span: 类提供 ASP.NET 服务器控件在将 cHTML 内容呈现给客户端时所使用的格式化功能。

span.span: The class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering cHTML content to clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Compact HTML 或 cHTML 是 HTML 2.0、 HTML 3.2 和 HTML 4.0 的子集，专为具有有限的内存和 CPU 性能，以及显示屏幕较小，有限格式设置功能和有限的数量的输入选项 （如移动电话的设备上呈现触摸板）。Compact HTML, or cHTML, is a subset of HTML 2.0, HTML 3.2, and HTML 4.0, and is designed to render on devices with limited memory and CPU power, along with small display screens, limited formatting capabilities, and a limited number of input options (such as a cell phone touch pad). 因此，cHTML 不支持以下：Therefore, cHTML does not support the following: - JPEG 图像。JPEG images. - 表。Tables. - 图像映射。Image maps. - 多个字符的字体和样式。Multiple character fonts and styles. - 背景颜色和图像。Background colors and images. - 帧数。Frames. - 样式表。Style sheets. 类派生自类和其许多功能均由提供和所有标记的文本编写器的基类即类。The class derives from the class and much of its functionality is provided by the and the base class for all markup text writers, which is the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为类`CustomChtmlTextWriter`派生自类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a class named `CustomChtmlTextWriter` that is derived from the class. 它会创建两个构造函数并将重写方法，以阻止`bgcolor`样式属性写入到输出流的对象。It creates two constructors and overrides the method to prevent the `bgcolor` style attribute from being written to the output stream of the object. 它还将创建一个名为类`ChtmlCustomPageAdapter`，它定义一种方法， `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`，它创建并返回的实例`CustomChtmlTextWriter`类。It also creates a class named `ChtmlCustomPageAdapter` that defines one method, `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`, which creates and returns an instance of the `CustomChtmlTextWriter` class. `CustomChtmlTextWriter`然后呈现 cHTML 的浏览器中使用的 cHTML 标记的设备到页的内容。The `CustomChtmlTextWriter` then renders cHTML content for a page to devices with browsers that use cHTML markup. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/cs/chtmltextwriter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/vb/chtmltextwriter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类有两个构造函数，这是标准的所有直接或间接派生的类类。The class has two constructors, which is standard for all classes that derive directly or indirectly from the class. 构造函数，它的实例类作为参数，将调用第二个构造函数并将其传递两个参数值：The constructor, which takes an instance of the class as a parameter, calls the second constructor and passes it two parameter values: - 。The . - 中指定的字符串值字段中，它定义 XHTML 文本编写器使用的制表符间距。The string value that is specified in the field, which defines the tab spacing that is used by the XHTML text writer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为类`ChtmlCustomPageAdapter`，并定义一个方法`CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`，它创建并返回的实例`CustomChtmlTextWriter`类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a class named `ChtmlCustomPageAdapter` and defines one method, `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`, which creates and returns an instance of the `CustomChtmlTextWriter` class. `CustomChtmlTextWriter`然后呈现 cHTML 的设备进行的浏览器中使用的 cHTML 标记的页面的内容。The `CustomChtmlTextWriter` then renders cHTML content for pages to devices with browsers that use cHTML markup. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/cs/chtmltextwriter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/vb/chtmltextwriter.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数，它采用的两个实例类和一个字符串作为参数，调用创建的实例时采用相同的参数的构造函数类。The constructor, which takes both an instance of the class and a string as parameters, calls the constructor that takes the same parameters when it creates an instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为的自定义类`CustomChtmlTextWriter`派生自类。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom class named `CustomChtmlTextWriter` that is derived from the class. 它将创建两个构造函数可用于创建自定义类的实例具有相同的模式为所有派生的类，直接或间接从类。It creates two constructors that you can use to create an instance of the custom class with the same pattern as all classes that derive, directly or indirectly, from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下方法可防止全局取消中列出的特性属性和特定于元素的已取消的特性中列出的从正在写入到输出流的属性。By default, the method prevents globally suppressed attributes that are listed in the property and element-specific, suppressed attributes that are listed in the property from being written to the output stream. 您可以重写的行为方法的类中的派生自类。You can override the behavior of the method in classes that are derived from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用一个重写的自定义类方法，以阻止`bgcolor`写入 cHTML 输出流的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use a custom class that overrides the method to prevent the `bgcolor` attribute from being written to the cHTML output stream. 然后，它调用由基提供的功能方法从类，以确保使用其默认行为，过。It then calls the functionality that is provided by the base method from the class to ensure that its default behavior is used, too. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 将 元素写入 cHTML 输出流。

span.span: Writes a element to the cHTML output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来插入行进入 cHMTL 的流。Use the method to insert a line break into a stream of cHMTL. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何创建 cHTML 类和自定义属性。The first code example demonstrates how to create a cHTML class and custom properties. 第二个代码示例演示如何在网页上使用的自定义类。The second code example demonstrates how to use a custom class on a Web page. 若要使用自定义`ChtmlSimplelabelAdapter`适配器，添加以下代码为浏览器的.NET Framework 配置目录或 Web 下 App_Browsers 目录中的自定义浏览器文件的适当计算机范围内文件的子目录中应用程序根目录。To use the custom `ChtmlSimplelabelAdapter` adapter, add the following code to either the appropriate machine-wide file in the subdirectory for the browser of the .NET Framework configuration directory or to a custom browser file in the App_Browsers directory under the Web application root. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为 cHTML 适配器类`ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter`名为的类`SimpleLabel`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a cHTML adapter class named `ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter` for a class named `SimpleLabel`. 创建一个自定义`Control`属性，它允许`ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter`类来访问的成员`SimpleLabel`类，然后重写方法。It creates a custom `Control` property that allows the `ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter` class to access the members of the `SimpleLabel` class, and then overrides the method. 重写时，将发生以下事件：In the override, the following things occur: - 创建对的引用名为的对象`w`，它派生自作为传递的对象`writer`参数方法。It creates a reference to a object, named `w`, which is derived from the object that is passed as the `writer` parameter for the method. - 它会创建一个字符串，并将它设置为等于`SimpleLabel.Text`值。It creates a string and sets it equal to the `SimpleLabel.Text` value. - 它将调用方法将由定义样式应用chtml 标签的属性输出流。It calls the method to apply the styles that are defined by the property of the label to the cHTML output stream. - 它将写入`Text`属性值写入流，并关闭 style 块通过调用方法。It writes the `Text` property value to the stream and closes the style block by calling the method. - 它将调用方法以呈现`br`元素之后的文本和样式呈现的输出流。It calls the method to render a `br` element to the output stream after the text and styles render. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/chtmltestlabel.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/chtmltestlabel.vb#2)] 下面的示例演示如何使用`SimpleLabel`在网页中的类。The following example demonstrates how to use the `SimpleLabel` class in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/chtmltestlabel.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/chtmltestlabel.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void WriteEncodedText (string text);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteEncodedText(string text) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteEncodedText (text As String)
public: override void WriteEncodedText(System::String ^ text);
override this.WriteEncodedText : string -> unit

param.name: text
param.span: 要进行编码并写入到输出流的文本字符串。

span.span: The text string to encode and write to the output stream.

summary.span: 对请求设备的指定文本进行编码，然后将其写入到输出流。

span.span: Encodes the specified text for the requesting device, and then writes it to the output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文本参数传递到方法是`null`或长度为零，则不会写入。If the text parameter passed into the method is `null` or has a length of zero, then nothing is written. 使用方法时的字符串包含尖括号 (\<或 >) 或与号 (&) 和你想要确保请求的设备上它们也能正确呈现。Use the method when a string contains angle brackets (\< or >) or an ampersand (&) and you want to ensure that they are rendered correctly on the requesting device. 方法使用基类的方法。The method uses the base class's method.
